source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_00<tab>Unukalhai's success with Taynor has only made him more eager to proceed.

TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_01<tab>He and Taynor having mastered the power to open hollows, Unukalhai asks that you contact Beq Lugg and inquire as to their progress in developing a means of gathering information in the void. Fortuitously, you receive an answer in the affirmative from them moments later. As whatever method Beq Lugg has devised is apparently best employed with a minimum of interference from nearby aetherytes, you agree to meet at Laxan Loft to conduct your investigation.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_01<tab>Unukalhai und Taynor haben sich gut aufeinander eingespielt und sind bereit, ein Dimensionstor zur dreizehnten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt zu öffnen. Begleite sie zu Burg Selard.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_02<tab>Beq Lugg joins you at Laxan Loft, accompanied by Cyella and the porxie charged with delving into the void. Unukalhai and Taynor have no difficulty opening a portal sufficient for its passage─though as before, this seems to serve as an invitation for opportunistic voidsent.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_02<tab>Beq Lugg stößt zu euch und schlägt vor, die dreizehnte Splitter<var 16 /var>welt von einer Quiexie erkunden zu lassen. Unukalhai und Taynor öffnen gemeinsam ein ausreichend großes Dimensionstor, durch das ihr die Quiexie schickt. Leider gelangt dadurch auch eine schreckliche Kreatur in eure Welt.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_03<tab>Though it was clearly of higher rank than those that were summoned via previous hollows, you are nevertheless successful in putting an end to the voidsent. In fact, you accomplish this with such efficiency that none of your comrades even have the opportunity to step in and assist you. Or they simply couldn't be bothered. One of the two.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_03<tab>Du besiegst das Wesen. Sprich mit Beq Lugg bei Burg Selard.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_04<tab>You inquire with Beq Lugg regarding the status of their porxie, who they believe ought to have returned by now. Taynor suggests that it might have become lost, and would perhaps be well served by an aetherial lodestone to guide it home.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_04<tab>Beq Lugg ist besorgt, dass sich die Quiexie verlaufen haben könnte. Leite Äther durch <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61EB0A2020502 /var>, um dadurch der Quiexie den Weg zu weisen.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_05<tab>Much as you once did to rescue Taynor, you channel your aether into the hollow. After a short but tense wait, Beq Lugg senses the porxie approaching, and it at last emerges from the portal, safe and sound. Though the Nu Mou is pleased to announce that their familiar has gathered quite a bit of information on conditions in the void, they also caution that it will take considerable time to review it all, let alone come up with a possible means to restore balance to the Thirteenth. Undaunted, Unukalhai vows to wait as long as is necessary if there is any hope of saving his home. As there is little you can do here in the meanwhile, however, you agree to follow Cyella back to the Wandering Stairs.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_05<tab>Die Quiexie folgt deiner Ätherspur zurück in eure Welt. Sie hat viele Informationen gesammelt, die womöglich Hinweise darauf geben, wie die dreizehnte Splitter<var 16 /var>welt gerettet werden kann. Die Analyse der Informationen wird jedoch einige Zeit in Anspruch nehmen. Kehre in den Sternenhagel zurück und sprich dort mit Cerigg.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_06<tab>Back at the tavern, Unukalhai again affirms his intention to stay in the First until Beq Lugg finishes their research, prompting Taynor to invite his new friend to join him and Cerigg in hunting down sin eaters and other threats to Norvrandt. No sooner does he agree than is he joined by Giott, Granson, and Lue-Reeq, who learned of Unukalhai's mission from Cyella and are determined to see it done. With these brave souls so aligned, the day may indeed come that the Thirteenth sees Light once again...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_06<tab>Unukalhai beschließt, vorerst im ersten Splitter zu verweilen, und Taynor schlägt ihm vor, sich den Kopfgeldjägern anzuschließen. Auch die anderen Kopfgeldjäger - Granson, Giott, Lue-Reeq und Cerigg<var 1D /var>- heißen ihn willkommen. Unukalhai ist entschlossen, nun endlich Heldentaten zu vollbringen und hoffentlich irgendwann seine Heimat, den dreizehnten Splitter, zu retten.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_07<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_08<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_SEQ_09<tab>

TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Unukalhai.
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_01<tab>Defeat the voidsent.
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Beq Lugg at Laxan Loft.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_02<tab>Bei Burg Selard mit Beq Lugg sprechen

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_03<tab>Channel aether into the hollow.
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_04<tab>Speak to Cerigg at the Wandering Stairs.
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_08<tab>

TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_10<tab>

TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TODO_23<tab>

TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_001<tab>Now that Taynor and I are capable of performing the necessary magicks, I should like to make an attempt at investigating conditions on the Thirteenth. Might I trouble you to contact Beq Lugg?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_001<tab>Ich denke, wir sind bereit. Jetzt müssen wir nur noch einen Weg finden, den dreizehnten Splitter zu untersuchen. Ich hoffe, Beq Lugg hat etwas herausgefunden.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_002<tab>(-Beq Lugg-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Are you there? I hope you've not lost focus on the void problem. I have an exciting breakthrough to share─a work of porxie-related genius, if I do say so myself.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_002<tab>(-Beq Luggs Stimme-)Wie läuft es bei euch? Ich hatte einen einfallsreichen Einfall, wie wir den dreizehnten Splitter beobachten können.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_003<tab>Beq Lugg! Excellent timing. We've made considerable progress as well, and are ready to open a portal when you are.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_003<tab>Wunderbar! Wir sind auch bereit. Kommst du zum Tor des Exarchen?

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_004<tab>(-Beq Lugg-)Well, then... What say you meet me at Laxan Loft forthwith? It's far enough from any major aetherytes as to avoid the sort of aetherial interference that would be a hindrance to our observation of the void.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_004<tab>(-Beq Luggs Stimme-)Hm, ein Ätheryt in der Nähe könnte die Ergebnisse verzerrend verfälschen. Lasst uns das Ritual lieber drüben bei Burg Selard durchführen.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_005<tab>Very well. We will see you at this “Laxan Loft” anon...or as soon as I can locate it.
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_006<tab>I'll lead the way. I too am eager to be one step nearer to our goal.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_006<tab>Komm, ich zeige dir den Weg zu Burg Selard. Unukalhai<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_100_006<tab>You don't mind if I think of it as “our” goal, do you?
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_007<tab>I would be honored. Thank you, Taynor.
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_010<tab>Like talking to an old friend... Yes, that's what it's like.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_010<tab>Als Unukalhai und ich unsere Kräfte miteinander verbanden, hatte ich ein eigenartig vertrautes Gefühl. Seltsam<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_050<tab>It appears Beq Lugg has yet to arrive. Patience, Unukalhai...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_050<tab>Beq Lugg ist offensichtlich noch nicht hier, aber er kommt bestimmt bald.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_051<tab>I hope you weren't waiting too long.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_051<tab>Schön, euch zu sehen. Wollen wir gleich mit dem Experiment beginnen?

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_052<tab>What, you didn't think I'd want to see this for myself? The Thirteenth was my home too, if you recall.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_052<tab>Was guckst du so überrascht? Hier geht es um meine Heimat. Das will ich mir nicht entgehen lassen. Glynard kümmert sich solange um den Sternenhagel.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_053<tab>Quite. Though as I explained, we won't be the ones doing the seeing, strictly speaking─this familiar will gather all the information we need. Assuming you two can create a hollow for it to pass through?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_053<tab>Nun gut, die Methode ist eigentlich ganz eingängig-einfach. Wir schicken diese Quiexie hinüber und lassen von ihr den dreizehnten Splitter auskundschaften. Wir brauchen also ein Portal, das groß genug für sie ist.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_054<tab>That will do nicely. Now fly, my porxie! Fly!
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_055<tab>Well...it's made it in.
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_056<tab>And something is coming out!
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_056<tab>Noch nicht ganz! Da kommt etwas durch das Dimensionstor in unsere Richtung!

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_057<tab>My, that is an ugly one, isn't it?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_057<tab>Oh, um den garstig-grimmigen Störenfried musst du dich kümmern!

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_060<tab>I can still scarce believe how quickly we've progressed. It's almost as if we've been friends all along.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_060<tab>Warum bloß ist mir Unukalhai so vertraut? Wir kennen uns doch erst seit kurzem.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_150<tab>Thank you for clearing that up. The porxie ought to be back any moment now... Though I can't sense it. Odd.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_150<tab>Hm<var 1D /var>... So langsam wird es Zeit, dass unsere gute Quiexie zurückkommt.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_151<tab>Perhaps it's lost? If <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> created an aetheric beacon as <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> did for me, it might find its way back more easily.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_151<tab>Womöglich hat sie sich verlaufen? Vielleicht können wir ihr mit einer Ätherspur die richtige Richtung zeigen. So wie damals, als ihr mich gerettet habt!

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_152<tab>Hm... That may work. Give it a go.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_152<tab>Einen Versuch ist es wert. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, kannst du das über<var 16 /var>nehmen?

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_155<tab>We've already come further than I dared hope. I am truly fortunate to have found Taynor.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_155<tab>Ich bin froh, dass es uns gelungen ist, das Portal zu öffnen. Ohne Taynor hätte ich das sicher nicht geschafft.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_160<tab>Those two have really taken to each other, haven't they? I suppose they are of a similar age...in some ways, at any rate.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_160<tab>Na, die beiden haben sich ja schnell angefreundet. Und das trotz ihres großen Altersunterschieds<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_165<tab>As I expected, these creatures hardly pose a challenge to you. Maybe don't tell Cerigg about how large and horrible that one was, though?
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_200<tab>Keep at it...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_200<tab>Gut so! Lass den Äther weiter fließen!

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_201<tab>Aha! A distinctly porxie-like presence!
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_202<tab>I see the snout!
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_203<tab>There we are. Now close that hollow before anything follows!

TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_204<tab>I believe it has performed its task thoroughly, as instructed. Good porxie. With luck, its observations may indeed lead us to a means of driving the Darkness from the Thirteenth.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_204<tab>Die Quiexie hat eifrig-emsig Informationen gesammelt. Wir müssen sie erst auswerten, aber es kann gut sein, dass sie uns einen Hinweis darauf liefern, ob die dreizehnte Splitter<var 16 /var>welt gerettet werden kann.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_205<tab>However, I will need to review its findings in detail before I can tell you more─and it could take years to deduce a suitable solution.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_205<tab>Aber selbst wenn es möglich ist, wird es bestimmt nicht einfach. Es könnte Jahre in Anspruch nehmen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_206<tab>I admit that I am impatient to find a way forward─but I have endured millennia with half as much hope as I have now. If I must wait, then that is what I shall do.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_206<tab>Seit tausenden von Jahren warten wir auf die Gelegenheit, eine wahre Heldentat zu vollbringen. Ein paar Jahre mehr oder weniger spielen da keine große Rolle.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_207<tab>Like <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and your Warriors of Light, I will persevere until my world is safe once more. That is what a hero does.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_207<tab>Ich werde mir ein Beispiel an den Helden dieser Welt und vor allem an <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> nehmen und niemals aufgeben.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_208<tab>I think you'll make a good one.
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_209<tab>You as well.

TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_210<tab>If that's the end of the excitement for the time being, we should head back to the Wandering Stairs. Clear out that pall of anxiety Cerigg is spreading all over the place.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_210<tab>Kommt, lasst uns nach Crystarium zurückkehren! Cerigg macht sich bestimmt schon Sorgen um Taynor.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_215<tab>The “stare at it for a prolonged period” method has proven ineffective, so you may as well try channeling aether as the boy suggested.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_BEQLUGG_000_215<tab>Ich fürchte, unsere eifrig-emsige Quiexie hat sich verlaufen. Bitte leite Äther durch das Dimensionstor, damit sie den Weg zurückfindet.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CERIGG_000_250<tab>Ah, you've returned hale and whole! ...Not that I had any doubt you would, of course.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CERIGG_000_250<tab>Ah, euren zufriedenen Gesichtern nach zu urteilen, hattet ihr Erfolg.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CERIGG_000_251<tab>And...how did your search of the hollow go?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CERIGG_000_251<tab>Sagt schon! Was habt ihr herausgefunden? Kann die dreizehnte Splitter<var 16 /var>welt gerettet werden?

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_252<tab>We may have the information we need to save the Thirteenth.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_252<tab>Es gibt Hoffnung, aber es wird mit Sicherheit nicht schnell gehen. Beq Lugg meinte, es könne Jahre dauern.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_253<tab>It may be some time─years, maybe─until we can be certain. But I will be here for as long as it takes.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_253<tab>Ich will vorerst hier in dieser Welt verweilen, zumindest bis Beq Lugg die gesammelten Informationen ausgewertet hat.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_254<tab>On that subject, I've been thinking...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_254<tab>Unukalhai, auf dem Rückweg hierher habe ich nachgedacht.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_255<tab>Would you be interested in joining us? As a bounty hunter, I mean. Cerigg and I hunt down sin eaters and other threats.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_255<tab>Was hältst du davon, uns bei der Kopfgeldjagd zu helfen?

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_256<tab>The First was saved, but it remains far from safe. You could help us protect the people here.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_256<tab>In dieser Welt lauern noch viele Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger und andere Gefahren. Irgendjemand muss die Bewohner beschützen. Die Arbeit ist nicht ganz ungefährlich, aber du könntest dadurch deinen Lebens<var 16 /var>unter<var 16 /var>halt verdienen und deine Fähigkeiten verbessern.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_257<tab>I... I think I would quite like that. Protecting people.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_257<tab>Stimmt, das könnte nötig sein<var 1D /var>... Falls wir einen Weg finden, den dreizehnten Splitter zu retten, werde ich alle Kraft brauchen, die ich aufbringen kann.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_258<tab>If I can do that, then perhaps I will find the strength I need when the time comes.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_258<tab>Danke, Taynor. Ich nehme deinen Vorschlag gerne an.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_GIOTT_000_259<tab>(-???-)Strength, you say? Sounds like you could use a dwarf with a massive hammer!
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_GIOTT_000_259<tab>(-???-)Na, das klingt ja spannend! Da wollen wir unseren Neuzugang doch gleich begrüßen!

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_260<tab>I may have shared the tale of the Thirteenth with a few other noted hunters.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_260<tab>Unukalhai scheint ja sehr beliebt zu sein.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_GRANSON_000_261<tab>Aye. I know what it feels like to fight for something you've already lost. To need to find a way to make it right.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_GRANSON_000_261<tab>Andere zu beschützen, erfordert viel Kraft und Übung. Auch ich bin noch längst nicht da, wo ich sein möchte.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_LUEREEQ_000_262<tab>And I know that it's not easy to fight on your own─inconvenient as that little truth may be.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_LUEREEQ_000_262<tab>Wer auf sich allein gestellt ist, hat es schwer. Gemeinsam ist man viel erfolgreicher!

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_GIOTT_000_263<tab>...Thus a new team is born! This calls for a toast!
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CERIGG_000_264<tab>I don't object─so long as this lot carries their weight. I'm a bounty hunter, not a phooka herder.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CERIGG_000_264<tab>Ich bin Kopfgeldjäger und habe keine Lust, auf ein Kind aufzupassen. Wenn du bei uns bleiben willst, musst du dich nützlich machen!

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_265<tab>Thank you so much...all of you. I would be honored to fight at your side.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_265<tab>Ich werde mein Bestes geben! Danke, dass ihr mich aufnehmt.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_266<tab>I shall do my best to justify the faith you have shown in me─and to save my home. Someday, I hope we can visit it together.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_UNUKALHAI_000_266<tab>Das ist meine Gelegenheit, doch noch ein Held zu werden und die dreizehnte Splitter<var 16 /var>welt zu retten, und ich werde sie nutzen. Das hast du mir ermöglicht. Vielen Dank!

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_270<tab>I did tell Cerigg that everyone is fine, but you may need to assure him personally that Taynor hasn't been devoured by a voidsent or what have you.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CYELLA_000_270<tab>Melde dich doch gleich bei Cerigg. Er macht sich schon Sorgen um Taynor.

source: TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_GRANSON_000_275<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_GRANSON_000_280<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_LUEREEQ_000_285<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_LUEREEQ_000_290<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_CERIGG_000_295<tab>
TEXT_LUCKUN003_03988_TAYNOR_000_300<tab>
